item.title: 政治、经济和市场造成了 2025 年的三体问题
item.description:
打起精神。今年将是股票、债券、商品和货币的过山车之年。【原文：

Buckle up. This year will be a rollercoaster for stocks, bonds, commodities and currencies.

】

item.title: 泰国政府称央行行长任命不会耗时太久
item.description: 泰国政府希望遴选小组能尽快结束为国家中央银行挑选新主席的程序，因为之前提名的人选因与执政党的关系而被认为不适合这一职位。【原文：Thailand’s government expects a selection panel to quickly conclude the process to pick a new chairman for the nation’s central bank after its previous nominee was deemed unsuitable for the job due to his ties with the ruling party.】

item.title: 上月注入 2,330 亿美元现金后，中国人民银行可能推迟下调存款准备金率
item.description: 中国央行在 2024 年底向市场注入了大量流动性，而没有采取高调的刺激措施，因为官员们要在美国当选总统唐纳德-特朗普重新上任前保留政策空间。【原文：China’s central bank injected massive liquidity into the market at the end of 2024 without using high-profile stimulus, as officials preserve policy space before US President-elect Donald Trump returns to office.】

item.title: 财政部长淡化赤字，印尼盾因增税规模缩减而下滑
item.description: 印尼总统普拉博沃-苏比安托（Prabowo Subianto）出人意料地决定缩减增税幅度后，印尼盾下跌了近1%，这促使财政部长淡化了人们对该国财政健康状况的担忧。【原文：Indonesia’s rupiah slumped nearly 1% after President Prabowo Subianto’s surprise decision to scale back a tax hike, prompting the finance minister to talk down concerns over the country’s fiscal health.】

item.title: 经济困境持续到新年，中国股市下滑
item.description: 中国股市在今年的第一个交易日下跌，因为投资者对制造业数据弱于预期以及唐纳德-特朗普上台后预期的关税上调等经济不确定性做好了准备。【原文：Chinese stocks fell on their first trading day of the year as investors braced for economic uncertainties with weaker-than-expected manufacturing data and an anticipated hike in tariffs once Donald Trump takes office.】

item.title: 散户投资者为玩具制造商香港首次公开募股借款逾 500 亿美元
item.description: 散户投资者借贷了500多亿美元参与中国玩具制造商百乐集团有限公司（Bloks Group Ltd.）在香港的首次公开募股，继续显示出对新股上市的需求。【原文：Retail investors have borrowed more than $50 billion to participate in Chinese toymaker Bloks Group Ltd.’s Hong Kong initial public offering, continuing to show demand for new listings.】

item.title: 2025 年开幕，中国前景备受关注，金属走高
item.description: 工业金属在今年的第一个交易日上涨，一项民间调查显示中国制造业有所扩张，投资者也在权衡中国政府在 2025 年采取更多刺激措施的可能性。【原文：Industrial metals rose on the first trading day of the year, with a private survey pointing to an expansion of manufacturing in China and investors weighing the scope for additional stimulus from Beijing in 2025.】

item.title: 特朗普关税威胁逼近，亚洲工厂保持增长
item.description: 随着国内订单和产出的改善，12 月份亚洲各地的工厂活动有所扩大，但信心的减弱和出口订单的持续下降预示着未来的全球风险。【原文：Factory activity across Asia expanded in December as domestic orders and output improved, but weaker confidence and a sustained drop in export orders point to global risks ahead.】

item.title: 2025 年伊始，印度小型公司面临盈利考验
item.description: 在交易日开始之前，我们为您带来可能影响市场的重要新闻和事件摘要。今天我们关注【原文：Before the trading day starts we bring you a digest of the key news and events that are likely to move markets. Today we look at:】

item.title: 俄乌过境结束后亚洲液化天然气价格将上涨
item.description: 俄罗斯天然气停止经由乌克兰流入欧洲，可能会加剧与亚洲的竞争，并提高替代品的价格。【原文：The end of Russian natural gas flows to Europe via Ukraine is likely to boost competition with Asia and prices for alternatives.】

item.title: 中国工厂活动增长放缓，经济复苏依然艰难
item.description: 中国的制造业活动在 12 月份放缓了扩张步伐，投资者正等待唐纳德-特朗普重返白宫威胁对中国出口产品征收关税时出台更多的经济刺激措施。【原文：China’s manufacturing activity slowed its pace of expansion in December, as investors wait for more economic stimulus when Donald Trump returns to the White House threatening tariffs on Chinese exports.】

item.title: 戒严令风波后韩国大幅下调国内生产总值预测
item.description: 韩国大幅下调了今年的经济增长预期，反映了被弹劾总统尹锡烈戒严令失败的影响，以及唐纳德-特朗普的关税计划给这个依赖贸易的国家带来的阴云。【原文：South Korea sharply cut its economic growth forecasts for this year, reflecting the fallout from impeached President Yoon Suk Yeol’s martial law debacle and the clouds hanging over the trade-reliant nation from Donald Trump’s tariff plans.】

item.title: 中国面临 2025 年首次外汇大考，人民币红线成为关注焦点
item.description: 离岸人民币年底跌至2022年以来最弱，这将使中国的每日货币参考汇率成为市场关注的焦点，因为市场正在评估决策者的潜在防御红线。【原文：The offshore yuan’s year-end slide to its weakest since 2022 is set to put the China’s daily reference rate for the currency in focus as the market assesses policymakers’ potential red line for defense.】

item.title: 新加坡房价因年底销售火爆而反弹
item.description: 新加坡私人住宅价格在经历了一年多以来的首次下跌后，在销售热潮的支撑下出现反弹。【原文：Singapore private home prices rebounded after its first drop in more than a year, underpinned by a rush of sales.】

item.title: 马斯克的 X 公司、谷歌尚未申请马来西亚新的社交媒体许可证
item.description: 据马来西亚互联网监管机构称，埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）的X公司和Alphabet公司旗下运营视频流媒体平台YouTube的谷歌公司尚未根据马来西亚周三生效的新法律申请社交媒体运营许可证。【原文：Elon Musk’s X and Alphabet Inc.’s Google, which operates video streaming platform YouTube, have not applied for a social media operating license under Malaysia’s new law which kicked in on Wednesday, according to the country’s internet regulator.】

item.title: 韩国央行行长 Rhee 称持续降息或成焦虑之源
item.description: 韩国央行行长李昌镛（Rhee Chang-yong）周四表示，持续降息可能成为焦虑的根源，他誓言将密切关注风险因素，以决定该行货币政策的步伐。【原文：Bank of Korea Governor Rhee Chang-yong said on Thursday continued rate cuts could become a source of anxiety as he vowed to closely monitor risk factors to determine the pace of the bank’s monetary policy.】

item.title: 交易商酝酿美国加息路径，黄金在年涨 27% 后持稳
item.description: 黄金在创下自 2010 年以来的最大年度涨幅后，新年伊始表现平稳，交易商对美联储在 2025 年放缓货币宽松步伐的前景进行了评估。【原文：Gold opened the New Year steady after notching its biggest annual gain since 2010, with traders assessing prospects for a slower pace of monetary easing by the Federal Reserve in 2025.】

item.title: 关税风险令亚洲股票交易商进入 2025 年倍感悲观
item.description: 亚洲股票投资者对 2025 年的开局相对悲观，因为他们担心唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）承诺提高关税以及美元走强的风险。【原文：Asian stock investors are relatively pessimistic for the start of 2025, citing concerns over Donald Trump’s pledge to boost tariffs and the risk of a stronger dollar.】

item.title: 新加坡上季度国内生产总值增长 4.3%，2024 年增长超预期
item.description: 新加坡上一季度经济增长稳健，为全年经济增长超出预期提供了动力。【原文：Singapore’s economy grew at a solid clip last quarter, providing momentum for full-year growth to surpass expectations.】

item.title: 墨西哥推迟征收游轮税，免除小麦关税
item.description: 墨西哥推迟六个月在其港口对游轮乘客征税，同时在 2025 年全年对小麦和一种化肥免征关税。【原文：Mexico delayed applying a tax on cruise ship passengers at its ports for six months while exempting wheat and a fertilizer from tariffs for all of 2025.】

item.title: 马斯克称拉斯维加斯酒店附近的网络卡车爆炸可能是恐怖主义行为
item.description: 埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）说，特斯拉公司（Tesla Inc.周三在拉斯维加斯特朗普酒店外发生的 Cybertruck 爆炸很可能是一起恐怖事件，并暗示这可能与新奥尔良发生的造成至少 15 人死亡的卡车肆虐事件有关。【原文：Elon Musk said that the explosion of a Tesla Inc. Cybertruck outside the Trump Las Vegas hotel on Wednesday was likely an act of terror and suggested that it could be linked to a truck rampage in New Orleans that killed at least 15 people.】

item.title: 报告显示美国原油库存下降，原油价格保持稳定
item.description: 在一份行业报告显示美国原油库存缩减之后，石油在新年第一个交易日持稳。【原文：Oil was steady in the first session of the new year after an industry report indicated shrinking US crude stockpiles.】

item.title: 亚洲在 2024 年的不祥结局之后迎来新年：市场综述
item.description: 对全球股市投资者来说，2024 年本是一个不吉利的年末，但在新年伊始，亚洲股市却一扫颓势。【原文：Asian stocks were primed to begin the New Year on a sour note after an inauspicious end to an otherwise stellar 2024 for global equity investors.】

item.title: 美国港口工人为何再次威胁罢工
item.description: 自从近 70 年前足以容纳 50 台冰箱的金属箱彻底改变了航运业以来，码头工人一直在为捍卫熟练劳动力在全球商业中的重要性而奋斗。然而，机器人和自动化技术的进步继续威胁着他们的角色，尤其是在美国港口。国际码头工人协会（International Longshoremen's Association，简称 ILA）拥有 47,000 名会员，代表着美国东部和墨西哥湾沿岸各大港口的货物装卸工人。【原文：Ever since metal boxes big enough to hold 50 refrigerators revolutionized shipping nearly 70 years ago, dockworkers have fought to defend the importance of skilled labor in global commerce. Yet technological advances in robotics and automation continue to threaten their roles, especially in US ports. The International Longshoremen’s Association, or ILA — the 47,000-member union that represents cargo handlers at every major Eastern US and Gulf Coast port — is threatening to walk off the job on Ja】

item.title: 前以色列国防部长加伦特表示将离开议会
item.description: 以色列前国防部长约阿夫-加兰特（Yoav Gallant）周三宣布，他将很快辞去议会职务，此举可能会让本雅明-内塔尼亚胡总理在一些关键投票中更容易获得多数票。【原文：Former Israeli Defense Minister Yoav Gallant announced Wednesday that he would soon resign from parliament, a move likely to make it a bit easier for Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu to muster majorities in some crucial votes.】

item.title: 车辆在拉斯维加斯特朗普酒店外起火爆炸
item.description: 拉斯维加斯（美联社）— 当局称，一辆汽车周三在当选总统唐纳德-特朗普位于拉斯维加斯的酒店大堂外起火爆炸。【原文：LAS VEGAS (AP) — A vehicle caught fire and exploded Wednesday outside the lobby of President-elect Donald Trump's hotel in Las Vegas, authorities said.】

item.title: 监管、交易和加密货币：2025 年值得关注的金融科技主题
item.description: 随着利率下调、金融科技股复苏以及特朗普第二任政府承诺放宽监管环境，2024 年笼罩在金融科技行业上空的阴云似乎正在散去，初创企业的前景更加光明。【原文：The clouds that hung over the financial-technology industry in 2024 appear to be clearing as interest-rate cuts, recoveries in fintech stocks and promises of a looser regulatory environment in the second Trump administration paint a more promising outlook for startups.】

item.title: 盖茨支持的 KoBold Metals 公司融资 5.37 亿美元
item.description: 由比尔-盖茨（Bill Gates）支持的美国公司 KoBold Metals 募集了 5.37 亿美元股本资金，用于促进对能源转型至关重要的矿产勘探。【原文：KoBold Metals, a US company backed by Bill Gates, raised $537 million in equity funding to boost exploration of minerals critical to the energy transition.】

item.title: 拉加德称欧洲央行希望在 2025 年实现 2% 的通胀目标
item.description: 欧洲央行行长克里斯蒂娜-拉加德（Christine Lagarde）表示，欧洲央行 2% 的通胀目标指日可待。【原文：The European Central Bank’s 2% inflation target is in sight, according to President Christine Lagarde.】
